title: Adding a ping indicator on the login screen
body: Riot, i think you should add a ping indicator on the log in screen like in the Chinese league login page. This will make it so that you know how your internet is and it won't unexpected when you join a game and realize you have bad ping, decreasing the gameplay experience for others.  I think overall this would really help decrease the amount of games where you meet a dc.
